items.summary: Update the single-page flow to have exactly 4 distinct sections that transition smoothly in this order: Page 1 -> Page 2 -> Page 3 -> Page 4. Pages 1‚Äì3 must advance via a clearly visible ‚ÄúNext‚Äù button, and Page 4 must not navigate away; instead it must show the final ‚ÄúYes‚Äù outcome content in-place after clicking ‚ÄúYes üåπ‚Äù.

Ensure the visual design matches a clean, aesthetic dark theme (black/deep grey) with elegant typography (Playfair Display or Poppins) applied consistently across all sections, while keeping the layout responsive for mobile.
Page 1 must display the centered text exactly "I'm really sorry chlow! ü§åüèª" and a ‚ÄúNext‚Äù button positioned at the bottom of the viewport.

Page 2 must display the text exactly "I want to hold u everytime ü´†" and render a black-and-white (grayscale) image area beneath it. Include a clear code comment indicating where the user can replace the image with their own URL.

Page 3 must display a heartfelt "Apology Love Message" as a long paragraph placeholder and show another image placeholder for a user-uploaded photo. Include a clear code comment indicating where the user can replace the image with their own URL.

Page 4 must display the text exactly "Are u willing to forgive me bab ‚ù§Ô∏è" with two buttons labeled exactly "Yes üåπ" and "No ü•Ä". The "No ü•Ä" button must evade interaction by moving away smoothly and randomly when the user attempts to click/tap/hover it, remaining within the visible container.

When "Yes üåπ" is clicked on Page 4, show the final message exactly "Awwwwweehh! Lvb u bab üíã" and render heart animations (e.g., floating/hearts bursting) over the page in a lightweight, mobile-friendly way.

Use only the user-uploaded images (6de4a0ed8a66079b44f32ddcb86801a1-7.jpg, Snapchat-44209910-7.jpg, 8cea9dbe688448677b472a8d5e73118d-11.jpg) as default imagery for Page 2 and Page 3 image areas, stored and referenced as static frontend assets. Do not introduce stock/external images.
